msg.error: Sorry but apparently you made an error in the command, thanks to read the **help module help** support
help_user: This commands displays the present help menu.
help: - _**all**_: provide a list of all controllers
- **module _name_**: provide help for the considered module
- **module _name_ detail**: provide details for the considered module
This help command provides an access on all help pages.
You can request all modules or only a specific one with or without detail.
